data.eml:eml: A redescription of Rhysida celeris (Humbert & Saussure, 1870), with a proposal of eight new synonyms (Scolopendromorpha, Scolopendridae, Otostigminae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chagas-Junior, Amazonas (2013): A redescription of Rhysida celeris (Humbert & Saussure, 1870), with a proposal of eight new synonyms (Scolopendromorpha, Scolopendridae, Otostigminae). ZooKeys 258: 17-29, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.258.4675, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.258.4675
